dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in April, President Tokayev was at the BS Arena sports complex in the Mangystau region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in April, President Tokayev was at the B S Arena sports complex in the Mangystau region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev visited the BS Arena sports complex during his working trip to the Mangystau region, according to the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, that was part of his working trip on the 18th, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, that was part of his working trip on the eighteenth, wasn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, Tokayev arrived in the Mangystau region on April 18 to inspect several facilities and hold a meeting on the region's socio-economic development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he got a full briefing on the place—it's a multifunctional complex, really modern, designed for international competitions and cultural events too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he got a full briefing on the place-it's a multifunctional complex, really modern, designed for international competitions and cultural events too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the visit, the Head of State was briefed on the operations of the multifunctional complex, which is equipped with modern facilities for hosting international and national sports competitions, as well as cultural events.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I heard he, uh, spoke with local athletes and wished them success. Nice touch.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I heard he, uh, spoke with local athletes and wished them success. Nice touch.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Kassym-Jomart Tokayev spoke with local athletes and wished them success," the Akorda press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the facilities there are no joke—volleyball, basketball, futsal courts…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the facilities there are no joke-volleyball, basketball, futsal courts...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that the sports complex includes courts for volleyball, basketball, and futsal, indoor and outdoor tennis courts, a swimming pool, halls for martial arts and fitness, as well as a football field with stands.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Indoor and outdoor tennis courts too, right? And a swimming pool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Indoor and outdoor tennis courts too, right? And a swimming pool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that the sports complex includes courts for volleyball, basketball, and futsal, indoor and outdoor tennis courts, a swimming pool, halls for martial arts and fitness, as well as a football field with stands.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, plus martial arts halls, fitness areas, and even a full football field with stands.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, plus martial arts halls, fitness areas, and even a full football field with stands.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that the sports complex includes courts for volleyball, basketball, and futsal, indoor and outdoor tennis courts, a swimming pool, halls for martial arts and fitness, as well as a football field with stands.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like they've got everything covered for both athletes and the community.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like they've got everything covered for both athletes and the community.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It does. And this visit was part of a bigger agenda—inspecting regional development projects.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does. And this visit was part of a bigger agenda-inspecting regional development projects.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, Tokayev arrived in the Mangystau region on April 18 to inspect several facilities and hold a meeting on the region's socio-economic development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he also went to that wholesale distribution center in Aktau during the same trip.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he also went to that wholesale distribution center in Aktau during the same trip.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Read also: Tokayev visits wholesale distribution center in Aktau

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Shows how much emphasis he's putting on infrastructure and local engagement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Shows how much emphasis he's putting on infrastructure and local engagement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. The Mangystau region seems to be getting some serious attention lately.
